solution_line_template: Andy and his brother ate {brother_ate} + {andy_ate} = <<{brother_ate}+{andy_ate}={cookies_andy_brother_ate}>>{cookies_andy_brother_ate} cookies in total.
The number of players is {num_players} so they would have eaten 1 + 3 + 5 + 7 + 9 + 11 + 13 + 15 = {cookies_basketball_team_ate} cookies.

In total Andy had {cookies_basketball_team_ate} + {cookies_andy_brother_ate} = <<{cookies_basketball_team_ate}+{cookies_andy_brother_ate}={total_initial_cookies}>>{total_initial_cookies} cookies to start with before they were all eaten.
